name: test_NAF_2_2_0_login_with_wrong_email
description:
Test Case: NAF-15
    As a user, I want to log in with my email and password
    Scenario: Login Unsuccessful due to Non-existent Email
    
    Steps:
    1. Open the app
    2. Click on "Log in" button
    3. Click on "Sign in with your email" button
    4. Enter non-existent email: test@example.com
    5. Enter password: testpassword
    6. Click "Log in" button    
    7. Verify error message appears
    
    Expected Result: Error message "There is no account associated with this email. Please sign up." should be displayed
descriptionHtml:
Test Case: NAF-15
As a user, I want to log in with my email and password
Scenario: Login Unsuccessful due to Non-existent Email

Steps:
1. Open the app
2. Click on "Log in" button
3. Click on "Sign in with your email" button
4. Enter non-existent email: test@example.com
5. Enter password: testpassword
6. Click "Log in" button    
7. Verify error message appears

Expected Result: Error message "There is no account associated with this email. Please sign up." should be displayed

labels.name: story
labels.value: 2.2.0 As a user, I want to log in with my email and password
